HTML.TargetBlank
TYPE: bool
VERSION: 4.4.0
DEFAULT: FALSE
--DESCRIPTION--
If enabled, <code>target=blank</code> attributes are added to all outgoing links.
(This includes links from an HTTPS version of a page to an HTTP version.)
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
